title: Can a 16 year old be a writer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Y not? have you heard of Anne frank? she was 12 when she started writing diary and she was excellent writer! providing documentation during war time and its effects on common people. Its not the age which matters. Zeal, interest, inspiration and love towards language matters!... You can be a writer at 99 also!
Writing doesn't knows age. You need to have a good imaginative power to see your characters live in front of your eyes. Be it 16 or 116 ,anyone can be a writer if you can give 100% efforts in it.
Age is just a number. So why not?

To become a good writer age never matters,  it depends how you convey your thought to others.  Follow some simple stapes. Think bigMake your vocabulary strongRead - Read - Read Start writing small articles around 2500 to 3500 words.
